Dear Sheffield City Council,
What Complaint Management, Member Enquiries and FOI/GDPR platforms are used by your council.
1. Complaint Management Platform information:
a. What Complaint Management platform(s) does your council currently use for Corporate / Social Housing / Adult Social Care / Children Act complaints?
b. When is the contract end date for the Complaint Management platform?
c. When was the Complaint Management contract last re-tendered?
d. Could you please provide the contract value for the Complaint Management platform?
(Please note that invoices exceeding £5,000 are required to be accessible
to the public.)
e. Is there an intent to release a tender for Complaint Management platforms in the
foreseeable future? If so, kindly provide an estimated timeline or relevant details." - then repeat for Member Enquiries and FOI/GDPR
Yours faithfully,
Nick Bellfield

Dear Nick Bellfield,
Thank you for your request for information relating to complaints platform
information which we received on 08/11/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt

your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 06/12/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
